ruleset.name: basic
ruleset.description: The Basic Ruleset contains a collection of good practice rules which everyone should follow.

rule.name: EmptyCatchBlock
rule.description: Empty Catch Block, will find instances where an exception is caught, but nothing is done. In most circumstances, this swallows an exception which should either be acted on, or reported.

rule.name: EmptyIfStmt
rule.description: Empty If Statement, will find instances where a condition is checked, but nothing is done about it.

rule.name: EmptyWhileStmt
rule.description: Empty While Statement, will find all instances where a while statement does nothing. This is just a waste of time. If it is a timing loop, then you should use Thread.sleep() for it.

rule.name: UnusedLocalVariable
rule.description: Unused Local Variables: detects when a variable is declared, but not used (except for possibly initial setting.)

rule.name: UnusedPrivateInstanceVariable
rule.description: Unused Private Instance Variable: detects when a private field is declared that is not used by the class.
